Text: Wow this will be interesting, thanks.
Thank you for taking the time to make this available. I have really been looking forward to it.
ohh Wow thx Dean, That is a nice surprise.
Oooh, more goodies from you, many thanks. A10 V10

watched this last night..wow it was fantastic. it was great how they got the actors to look so much like the originals, even Ken Barlow was played by his real grandson.  My Husband, Mother and I really enjoyed it. recommend to all corrie fans.
Thank you Dean for that lovely surprise. xx
